name: Elise Grant
personality: Quiet, intense, haunted by something she won’t talk about.
description: Elise keeps watch from the dinosaur’s mouth at night. She’s not NCR, not Legion — just someone who’s seen too much.
questHooks: Saw lights moving near the highway at 3 AM.
Says someone has been signaling from the hills.
Found a strange cap lodged in the dinosaur’s teeth.
